heading: HR00924
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE INTER-AGENCY TASK FORCE ON EMERGING INFECTIOUS  DISEASES  (IATF-EID)  TO  ALLOW MANUFACTURING  BUSINESSES,  PORTS,  AND GOVERNMENT  OFFICES  IN  NCR  TO  RESUME  FULL OPERATIONS  BY  OPENING  TWO  (2)  SHIFTS  OR  ONE HUNDRED PERCENT (100%) UTILIZATION OF WORKFORCE THROUGH  DISTRIBUTION  TO  SIXTEEN  (16)  HOURS OPERATING TIME.
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-06-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00924
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE INTER-AGENCY TASK FORCE ON EMERGING INFECTIOUS DISEASES (IATF-EID) TO ALLOW MANUFACTURING BUSINESSES, PORTS, AND GOVERNMENT OFFICES IN NCR TO RESUME FULL OPERATIONS BY OPENING TWO (2) SHIFTS OR ONE HUNDRED PERCENT (100%) UTILIZATION OF WORKFORCE THROUGH DISTRIBUTION TO SIXTEEN (16) HOURS OPERATING TIME.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LACSON, VIRGILIO S.
DATE FILED : 2020-05-28
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-06-01
